verses.name: Romans 16:5
verses.text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house. Salute my wellbeloved Epenetus, who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ.

verses.name: Romans 16:6
verses.text: Greet Mary, who bestowed much labour on us.

verses.name: Romans 16:7
verses.text: Salute Andronicus and Junia, my kinsmen, and my fellowprisoners, who are of note among the apostles, who also were in Christ before me.

verses.name: Romans 16:8
verses.text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord.

verses.name: Romans 16:9
verses.text: Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.

verses.name: Romans 16:10
verses.text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ. Salute them which are of Aristobulus’ household.

verses.name: Romans 16:11
verses.text: Salute Herodion my kinsman. Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus, which are in the Lord.
